Package me.autobot.sim.graphics.elements

Class CanvasButton

java.lang.Object
me.autobot.sim.graphics.elements.CanvasElement
me.autobot.sim.graphics.elements.CanvasButton
public class CanvasButton extends CanvasElement
A button that can be drawn on a canvas.

  • Constructor Details

    • CanvasButton

      public CanvasButton(int x, int y, int width, int height, String title, Runnable action)
      Creates a new CanvasButton with the given position, size, title, and action.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the button.
      y - The y position of the button.
      width - The width of the button.
      height - The height of the button.
      title - The title of the button.
      action - The action to run when the button is clicked.

  • Method Details

    • setStyle

      public CanvasButton setStyle(Color backgroundColor, Color textColor, Color hoverColor)
      Sets the style of the button.
      Parameters:
      backgroundColor - The background color of the button.
      textColor - The text color of the button.
      hoverColor - The color of the button when the mouse is hovering over it.
      Returns:
      The button object.

    • adjustText

      public CanvasButton adjustText(int fontSize, int leftPadding, int topPadding)
      Adjusts the text of the button.
      Parameters:
      fontSize - The font size of the text.
      leftPadding - The left padding of the text.
      topPadding - The top padding of the text.
      Returns:
      The button object.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, Int2 mousePosition)
      Draws the button on the canvas. Called internally by the canvas.
      Overrides:
      draw in class CanvasElement
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics object to draw on.
      mousePosition - The position of the mouse.

    • isInside

      public boolean isInside(Int2 point)
      Checks if the given point is inside the button.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to check. This should be the mouse position.
      Returns:
      Whether the point is inside the button.

    • run

      public void run()
      Run the action of the button.
